name: Ischemic Heart Disease
details: Occurs when the heart's blood supply is blocked or interrupted by a build-up of fatty substances.
treatment: Lifestyle changes, medications (e.g., statins, beta-blockers), or surgery (e.g., bypass or angioplasty).
